message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  I think this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $14,000 is a bit steep for me right now. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. What do you think?

Bob, I understand you're looking for the best value, and I want to make this work for both of us.  While $12,000 is a bit below what I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this reflects the true worth of the product and is a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $13,000, but I'm still not quite there.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This is a fair price that respects both our needs.
